predictions.text: When you use the Services or interact with emails from us, we and our third-party business partners may collect and store information about your use of our Services using cookies, pixel tags, local storage, and similar technologies.
predictions.description: Tracking pixels and/or device fingerprinting

predictions.text: Pixel tags are very small images or small pieces of data embedded in images, also known as “web beacons” or “clear GIFs,” that can recognize cookies, the time and date a page is viewed, a description of the page where the pixel tag is placed, and similar information from your device.
predictions.description: Tracking pixels and/or device fingerprinting

predictions.text: Local storage is similar to a cookie except that it can store larger amounts of information and can be stored elsewhere on your device
